sn56.54:4.1: * “Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, yatthimā mahānadiyo saṃsandanti samenti, seyyathidaṃ—
sn56.54:4.2: gaṅgā, yamunā, aciravatī, sarabhū, mahī, taṃ udakaṃ parikkhayaṃ pariyādānaṃ gaccheyya, ṭhapetvā dve vā tīṇi vā udakaphusitāni.
sn56.54:4.3: Taṃ kiṃ maññatha, bhikkhave, katamaṃ nu kho bahutaraṃ—
sn56.54:4.4: yaṃ vā saṃbhejjaudakaṃ parikkhīṇaṃ pariyādinnaṃ, yāni dve vā tīṇi vā udakaphusitāni avasiṭṭhānī”ti?
sn56.54:4.5: “Etadeva, bhante, bahutaraṃ saṃbhejjaudakaṃ yadidaṃ parikkhīṇaṃ pariyādinnaṃ;
sn56.54:4.6: appamattakāni dve vā tīṇi vā udakaphusitāni avasiṭṭhāni.
sn56.54:4.7: Saṅkhampi na upenti, upanidhampi na upenti, kalabhāgampi na upenti saṃbhejjaudakaṃ parikkhīṇaṃ pariyādinnaṃ upanidhāya dve vā tīṇi vā udakaphusitāni avasiṭṭhānī”ti.
